description: Lakeside city known for Phewa Lake and as a gateway to the Annapurna Circuit.
Historic square with palaces, courtyards and temples from the Malla period.
UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the holiest Hindu temples.
Jungle safari destination known for rhinos, tigers, and birdwatching.
Birthplace of Lord Buddha and UNESCO World Heritage Site.
